did.unittitle: HERE Financial Records Files on Microfilm

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Hotel Employees & Restaurant Employees International Union

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Hotel Employees and Restaurant Employees Union (HERE), was a United States labor union representing workers of the hospitality industry, formed in 1891. In 2004, HERE merged with the Union of Needletrades, Industrial, and Textile Employees (UNITE) to form UNITE HERE. HERE and later UNITE HERE were affiliated with the AFL-CIO until September 2005, when the General Executive Board of UNITE HERE voted in to leave the AFL-CIO and join with the Change to Win Coalition.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: HERE Financial Records Files on Microfilm #6199/007 mf. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
